name: 語言學概論（一）
comment: 建議修習輔系第一年時選修
goals: to familiarize the students enrolled with the fundamental concepts and the basic skills required for doing linguistic analysis
the students will be better equipped both for more advanced linguistics courses and as a competent English teacher.
syllabus:
This course introduces the core disciplines of linguistics, the scientific study of language. We will discuss the foundational questions linguists are interested in, the kinds of problems they are trying to solve, the nature of natural language, and its relation to the mind and the society. The course aims to develop and strengthen students’skills in logical reasoning and problem solving, which are invaluable in any field. 

Highly tentative schedule (details on schedule and requirements will be announced in the first class):

Week 1-3: Orientation & Chapter 1 What is language?

Week 4-6: Chapter 2 Morphology

Week 7: Midterm

Week 8-10: Chapter 5 Phonetics

Week 11-13: Chapter 6 Phonology

Week 14-15: TBD

Week 16: Final exam
